    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112029</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112029</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Deljenje decimalnih števil</string>
            <string language="en">Division of decimal fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abteilung der Dezimalbrüche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Division des fractions décimales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divisão de frações decimais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divisione delle frazioni decimali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τμήμα των δεκαδικών μερών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">División de fracciones decimales</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Program ponudi po 5 naključnih računov s pripadajočimi rešitvami ter statistiko pravilnosti reševanja. Ker vsebuje makroje – gumba »Novi računi« in »Preveri rešitev« , je za pravilno delovanje potrebno namestiti certifikat (skason) ali stopnjo varnosti v excelu nastaviti na »srednja« (orodja/ makro/ varnost/ srednja) ter tako omogočiti makroje. Najbolje je, da po končanem reševanju ne shranite sprememb.</string>
            <string language="en">Program that presents five random calculation and outputs a statistics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">matematika</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">deljenje</string>
            <string language="en">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">decimalno število</string>
            <string language="en">decimal number</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmieren Sie daß gelegentliche die 
Berechnung und Ausgaben der Geschenke fünf Statistiken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmez que calcul aléatoire et sorties des 
présents cinq des statistiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programe que cálculo aleatório e as saídas dos
presentes cinco statistics.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmisi che calcolo casuale ed uscite dei 
presenti cinque le statistiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα που παρουσιάζει τον τυχαίους υπολογισμό 
πέντε και τα αποτελέσματα στατιστικές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Programe que cálculo al azar y las salidas de 
los presentes cinco estadística.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abteilung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dezimale Zahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τμήμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεκαδικός αριθμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
